title: St. Pauls exercise, or, A sermon of conscience Describing the nature of it; and declaring the manner and meanes how to obtaine, and retaine, a good conscience. Preached by Iohn Hughes, Doctor in Diuinitie.
author: Hughes, John, fl. 1622.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Greene-Dragon in Pauls Church-yard,
